name: PocaPola Island Adventure
description:
Note: The game doesn't run well on browswer.  Download it for the best experience!

PocaPola Island Adventure is a  top-down adventure game with the ultimate goal of saving the environment. The game includes multiple unique characters and an interesting storyline that is completely up to the player to discover. This personal project was created with Unity Engine in 30 days.

Thanks for Playing! -Dylan Subramanian

Download Steps: 1) Press the download button 2) Extract the folder 3) Run the application file
